newsitem.title: MALTA: Malta's Mid-Med Overseas has record $4 mln profit.
newsitem.headline: Malta's Mid-Med Overseas has record $4 mln profit.

text.p: Mid-Med Bank (Overseas) Ltd, a subsidiary of Mid-Med Bank announced on Monday a record pre-tax profit of Lm1.45 million ($4 million) for the year to September, up 22 percent on the year before.
Bank chairman Norman Mifsud said earnings per share rose to 55 cents from 45 cents in 1995. Customers' deposits reached Lm61.7 million ($171.5 million) from Lm54.3 million ($151 million).
"This increase in deposits was broadly based over non-resident personal accounts, Maltese offshore company accounts and accounts of companies registered in foreign jurisdictions," Mifsud said.
The bank's own funds now stand at Lm4 million ($11.12 million) giving it a capital adequacy ratio of 27 percent, Mifsud said.
Mid-Med Overseas was set up three years ago.
